tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He's a doctor of a kind. Very Friendly, explains the treatment options and processes to adapt.  Keeps his clinic tidy and elite. Customer focused.
Overall, Dr Balajee and Elite Dentistry keeps you comfortable before and after the treatment in terms of recovery and budget.
Kudos to Dr Balajee

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Balajee ia * **** **** ***** friendly and humble doctor. He is very knowleglable and takes care of everything that bothers me due to my dental issues.

I definately recommend him to others, as finding a good dentist has always been a challenge and I really feel great to finally find him to help me with all my dental troubles.. Great going Dr.
 Thank you Dr :)
Doctor Baalajee is very friendly and seems he handles through Professionalism.He was friendmy and I am going for my regular Dental needs in this week
They are very friendly and explaining the issue clearly, even though i went late to the hospital, they have waited for me and I really appreciate th

Highly recommended.. doctors where friendly and so kind.. have taken braces treatment.. I’m very much nervous about my teeth extractions.. doctors made me feel so comfortable and post extraction I’m perfectly fine.. Thanks

review: Veryy kindly & patience to patient by explaining about their problems. Fully satisfied. Fees also reasonable.

review: Good , nicely done. Friendly doctor. Good experience. Made me feel comfortable. Had no worries regarding the procedure.

Nice..got mmediate attention and solution too. I thought of making this somewhere in March or April.
But due to pandamic.. today I consulted.. Be safe and SOP followed. Gud.
